title: SORAKA
body:
Please change sorakas heal to be able to heal self
if you step on teemo shroom or get poisoned on low hp u die where as if nami sona or tarice have this happen they juust use their SELF healing heal

replies.body: This makes no sense. Sorakas heal takes her health to heal and ally, she can't take her own health to heal herself. It will at best even out and she won't gain health. Her q or whatever is used to damage enemies and heal herself so that she can sustain health to heal allys.
make it cost mana not health, she is only champ with health costing heal, also u need to hit a enemy champion to heal not that easy to hit q when they try dodge it so u dont heal,
yes i know you could just get 3k hp on her and buy a warmogs so u regen the hp back up.
q only heals if u hit enemy champion

\*Plays Soraka\*
\*Steps on Teemo shroom\*
\*Spends 10% max health to heal ~5% health\*
